channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2024040574
item.description:
Report E-2024040574

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-16
  • City: TOMS BROOK
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 16, 2024, two (2) 5-gallon pails of paint were crushed in transit and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior and asphalt below. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel deployed absorbents to the release and worked them in with hand tools. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The crew then overpacked the damaged pails in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024041169
item.description:
Report X-2024041169

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-12
  • City: ALEXANDRIA
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZMAT AUDITOR WAS DOING THE 3 DAY UNDELCARED HAZMAT SHIPPER AUDIT FOUND 2 PACKAGES THAT IS COVERED BY BLACK PLASTIC. FOUND HAZMAT MARKINGS - 12 AEROSOLS, LIMITED QUANTITY MARK AND ARROWS POINTING UP. HAZMAT AUDITOR CALLED THE HMMS FOR UNDELCARED HAZMATS AND FOLLOWED THE INSTRUCTION GIVEN BY THE HMMS REPRRESENTATIVE. AEROSOLS, FLAMMABLE. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1Z1718EA0397361736. BOXES WERE COVERED IN BLACK PLASTIC; INNER BOXES MARKED WITH GROUND LTD QTY MARKING
